title: Womens Dress V Neck

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a touch of elegance and a feminine look, describing it as cozy and soft.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: Nice sweater. While it is kind of itchy it is thick and has a nice knit. I did use fashion tape to close the top a bit since you can’t adjust the ties at all. Read more
items.author: nicole reed

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: I've only washed it once and it already looks worn. Looked good when I first bought it but after only a few wears it's ready for good will. Read more
items.author: springmom67

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit however the ties are a question
items.body: I like this so much I’m taking it to my seamstress to have the raps removed or shortened. The sweater is too cute to return the size is a little big . The color is true I wear a small or extra small size D and this sweater fit great . The weight is nice- you can put a cami underneath without it being too much! Read more
items.author: kathleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Loved the sweater! Great quality! I had to return it because it was too big (reordered it in a smaller size). My suggestion is to size down. Read more
items.author: lovetoshop

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars You can’t adjust the sweater
items.body: The sweater was to big and the material was flimsy. I returned it Read more
items.author: Michelle Morris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, comfortable, v-neck doesn’t budge
items.body: Wore this for a photo shoot in 50 degree weather and without a tank top was comfortable in it just fine! Has a medium thickness weave to allow air flow but heavy enough to lay nicely without looking cheap. In moving around playing with my daughter for the photo shoot the v neck did not gape open! Which I was pleased about. Has a medium length waist fit. Would recommend wearing with pants waist level, not hip level to go best. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Did not like feel of the sweater
items.body: Fit okay but felt like the yarn was nylon or some nylon mix. Returned. Read more
items.author: 2of5

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sloppy Fitting in the Chest Area
items.body: This is a nice thick sweater, although IMO the material isn't very high quality. It is a thicker knit sweater and is pretty warm. The fit is really why I am sending it back. It just fits very baggy and sloppy in the chest area, If I kept it I would need to wear a tank under it and safety pin it also to keep it in place and sizing down wouldn't help because the rest of the sweater fits fine. I do like that the tie is a faux tie so it's easy to to keep the sweater tied and nothing will fall off. Read more
items.author: aberfitchgr534

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Navy, Pink, Beige, Purple, Yellow, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Green, Red-brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
